dict.acceptation: 奶奶；外婆；婆婆妈妈的人；

sent.orig: Delighted, she helped Granny with her housework and that made Granny very happy.
sent.trans: 莎莎愉快地帮奶奶干活，奶奶很高兴。

sent.orig: The old granny talked endlessly, but we listened to her with great patience.
sent.trans: 老奶奶叨絮不休，不过我们还是耐心地听着。

sent.orig: Oh, do come in, dear child, said Granny.
sent.trans: “哦，进来吧，亲爱的孩子。”奶奶说。

sent.orig: In 1637, Granny Xu celebrated her sixtieth birthday.
sent.trans: 1637年，徐老太太迎来了她的60大寿。

sent.orig: Yesterday Granny came. We hadn't seen each other for an year.
sent.trans: 奶奶昨天来了，我们已有半年没见面了。
